newsitem.title: DUBAI: Oman stocks mixed as trading value drops.
newsitem.headline: Oman stocks mixed as trading value drops.

text.p: Shares on Oman's stock exchange were mixed in the week to Wednesday with bank shares in the limelight for the second week running, a market report said.
The Muscat Securities Market said its index was fractionally lower at 183.56 points from last week's 184.45.
Bank shares accounted for 63 percent of total trading value of 4.15 million rials from 5.17 million rials the week before.
Of the 51 companies traded in the week, shares of 17 rose, 21 fell and 13 were unchanged, the report said.
Oman International Bank ended the week lower at 2.400 rials from 2.480 rials last week while National Bank of Oman ended higher at 3.150 from a previous 3.020 rials.
